reviews.title: Galaxy s 3
reviews.comment: On start up the screen is always fidgety with a lot of lines on t he screen very slow start but levels do load and work great. Just hard to navigate main screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gud game but would have been mre better
reviews.comment: Would hve been mre better...but becomes. Boring wen u cnt complete sum level
reviews.author: BABU BASHA

reviews.title: World 3 level 13
reviews.comment: I am stuck on this level. I just can\'t jump off the white brick on to the highest blue arrow bounce. I used the long jump to get the lowest star. Am I missing something?
reviews.author: Robin Myers

reviews.title: Simple Yet Brilliant
reviews.comment: Don\'t let the slightly simplistic graphics turn you off. One you\'ve gone through the training stages this game really ramps up in difficulty. This is not quick to finish, so you\'ll have plenty of entertainment, and all for free!
reviews.author: Andrew Parker

reviews.title: Great, but...
reviews.comment: Glad to see you\'ve made a new game, but I just wish you hadn\'t stuck with the truly awful design decision of forcing players to play through every level in order. Why? Just open them up. If players get stuck for a while they can try a different level. I stopped playing the first because of it.
reviews.author: Alex Washtell

reviews.title: improves on the original
reviews.comment: a small game that will eat away hours upon hours of your time. i agree with one of the other reviews that some of the levels can be truly infuriating and there should be some way to skip levels. although, this doesn\'t really affect me since i\'ve finished all but the final level. great game
reviews.author: Mike Rotch

reviews.title: Menu
reviews.comment: The menu is just a few blocks moving with a black background then a few stars then I press one and it puts a blank screen up. I pressed it randomly and a level did come up but I don\'t understand this
reviews.author: Lewis Jones

reviews.title: Fun but glitchy
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this game, became very addicted. However the menu to open and close the game is very glitchy looking and it sometimes makes me question having the game just because it almost looks harmful to my phone  if they could clean that up then I would love this game even more. Simple and fun.
reviews.author: Joshua von Wistinghausen

reviews.title: Great game, challenging
reviews.comment: This game is awesome and anyone who disagrees is probably just mad because they cannot beat it.  For those of you who enjoy a real challenge and not a children\'s game that could be beat in 10 minutes, download this and have fun.  If you want a Disney game, go download Where\'s My Perry.....its super easy for the kids.
reviews.author: Aaron Duke

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game, good improvements on the 1st game which is awesome. More levels please! Raon games rocks!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Korean\'s Best?!?
reviews.comment: Did they said that this one is among the best of Korean\'s Android game? Isn\'t Gamevil Korean? Sub-par graphics (3D ?!?), glitchy menu-screen and non-existent music? I\'d rather play ads-supported + IAP, but properly-made games. Two stars for its non mainstream gameplay and  difficulty level.
reviews.author: Hamran Marman

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Awesome game but need more is to make our own maps
reviews.author: Tony Bou Sader

reviews.title: Would be good
reviews.comment: This would be good. IF it wasn\'t glitchy at start up so so annoying please fix
reviews.author: Tim Partyparker

reviews.title: Hours of challenging fun
reviews.comment: Simple yet tricky. Some of the levels are so challenging but i managed to beat them all :o) i only seeked help for one level.
reviews.author: Quentin Moorman

reviews.title: Bounce Ball 2.5
reviews.comment: Not as good as the first one thats for sure but is still a great and fun game
reviews.author: Harry Bates

reviews.title: Terrible glitching
reviews.comment: This game glitches so much it is impossible to beat the last couple worlds more stars when it stops til then the stars stick.
reviews.author: Austin Mace

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Game would have gotten 5 stars but needs an answers page.  Some levels are just to difficult to figure out so the game does not get played.
reviews.author: Chris G

reviews.title: No good on nexus 4
reviews.comment: Menu screens don\'t show on the nexus. Game seems to work, but without a menu there is not much point.
reviews.author: Mark Gossage

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Waited for this only to find that it is too glitchy to play. I was only able to play a few levels  because every time I start it will only allow me to start at the early levels that I had already done.
reviews.author: Janelle Woffinden

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Its a great game I love it I am now stock on level 16 on the first star collection, when I am choosing the level it all goes dark on my go clever tablet please fix this because I have to turn it on its side to see otherwards this game deserves 5 full stars. Love the graphics
reviews.author: Lydia Cowman
